\Aura\DiConfig

Retains and unifies class configurations.

Properties

$params

$params : \ArrayObject

Constructor params from external configuration in the form `$params[$class][$name] = $value`.

Type

\ArrayObject

Tags

None found

$reflect

$reflect : array

An array of retained ReflectionClass instances; this is as much for the Forge as it is for Config.

Type

array

Tags

None found

$setter

$setter : \ArrayObject

Setter definitions in the form of `$setter[$class][$method] = $value`.

Type

\ArrayObject

Tags

None found

$unified

$unified : array

Constructor params and setter definitions, unified across class defaults, inheritance hierarchies, and external configurations.

Type

array

Tags

__clone()

__clone() : void

When cloning this object, reset the params and setter values (but leave the reflection values in place).

None found

getReflect()

getReflect(string $class) : \ReflectionClass

Returns a ReflectionClass for a named class.

Parameters

string $class

The class to reflect on.

Throws

\Aura\Di\Exception\ReflectionFailure

Could not reflect on the class.

Returns

\ReflectionClass

Tags

None found

fetch()

fetch(string $class) : array

Fetches the unified constructor params and setter values for a class.

Parameters

string $class

The class name to fetch values for.

Returns

array —

An array with two elements; 0 is the constructor values for the class, and 1 is the setter methods and values for the class.

Tags

None found

reset()

reset() : void

Resets the params and setter values.

Tags

None found
